system.description: The warded creature is immune to the effects of one spell you name at the time of casting. The spell must be 4th level or lower. The name must be the exact name of the spell. Spell immunity does not extend to area effects the subject is not the target of. You can have only one spell immunity active on the same creature at a time.

components.materialDescription: A small amount of powdered diamond (worth 150 gp).
